page.title: List of characters in Ako si Kim Samsoon

[[Image:AkoSiKimSamsoon.jpg|220px|thumb|right|[[Regine Velasquez]] as Kim Samsoon]]
 
This is a '''list of [[fictional characters]]''' from the [[Philippine drama]] '''[[Ako si Kim Samsoon]]'''. The series primarily centers around a single chubby middle-aged woman named Kim Samsoon, and her quest to find the man she will love forever.
